abstract.text: A mock context provider designed for unit testing.
This provider allows you to set up specific context scenarios
and verify that specifications behave correctly under controlled conditions.

inlineContent.text: A mock context provider designed for unit testing specifications.

allows you to set up specific context scenarios and verify that specifications behave correctly under controlled conditions. It provides builder-style configuration, request tracking, and pre-configured test scenarios.
: Set exact context state for testing
: Monitor how many times context is requested
: Pre-configured helpers for common test cases
: Built-in methods to assert expected behavior
Unit test specifications with controlled context
Verify specification behavior under specific conditions
Test edge cases and boundary conditions

to make their decisions, such as timestamps, counters, user state, etc.
